title: Pittsburgh Pirates average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 29.96 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 15.3 was reported at Year 2011
